template.name: sewi_odoo_form
template.value: <record id="$viewId$_view_form" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">$viewName$.view.form</field> <field name="model">$modelName$</field> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <form> <sheet> <group> <field name="name"/> </group> </sheet> </form> </field> </record>

template.name: sewi_odoo_qweb_add_template
sewi_odoo_toDo_xml_button_box_object

variable.name: confirm
variable.defaultValue: "(Un)archiving a project automatically (un)archives its tasks and issues. Do you want to proceed?"

template.name: sewi_odoo_smart_button
sewi_odoo_qweb_declare_reports
template.value: <!-- QWeb Reports --> <!-- NAME & FILE_NAME should be the same --> <report id="UNIQUE_REPORT_ID" model="MODEL_WHERE_THE_REPORT_WILL_BE_PRINTED" report_type="qweb-pdf" string="LABEL" name="NAME" file="FILE_NAME" />

template.name: sewi_odoo_form_header
template.value: <header> <button name="$buttonName$" string="$buttonName2$" class="oe_highlight" states="$jump$" type="$jump2$"/> <field name="state" widget="statusbar" statusbar_visible="open,done" statusbar_colors="{'open':'blue', 'done':'green'}"/> </header>

template.name: sewi_odoo_form_inherit
template.value:
<!-- Inherit Form View to Modify it --> <record id="$extraContentInput$" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">$extraContentInput2$</field> <field name="model">$modelName$</field> <field name="inherit_id" ref="$jump$.$extraContent$"/> <field name="arch" type="xml">
<xpath expr="//field[@name='name']" position=""> <!-- Add your fields or attributes here --> </xpath>
<field name="name" position=""> <!-- Add your fields or attributes here --> </field>
</field> </record>

template.name: sewi_odoo_menu
template.value: $modelName$.view.action ir.actions.act_window $modelName1$ tree,form

template.name: sewi_odoo_menu_action
template.value: $modelName2$.view.action ir.actions.act_window $modelName$ tree,form

template.name: sewi_odoo_kanban
template.value: <record id="$saleOrder2$_view_kanban" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">$saleOrder1$.kanban</field> <field name="model">$saleOrder$</field> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <kanban> <field name="name"/> <templates> <t t-name="kanban-box"> </t> </templates> </kanban> </field> </record>

template.name: sewi_odoo_search
template.value: <record id="$modelName2$_view_search" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">$modelName1$.view.search</field> <field name="model">$modelName$</field> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <search> <field name="name" string="Product" filter_domain="['|',('default_code','ilike',self),('name','ilike',self)]"/> <filter string="Archive" domain="[('active', '=', False)]"/> <separator/> <group> <filter string="State" context="{'group_by': 'state'}"/> </group> </search> </field> </record>

template.name: sewi_odoo_search_inherit
template.value: <record id="$extraContent1$" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">$extraContent2$</field> <field name="model">$modelName$</field> <field name="inherit_id" ref="$jump$.$extraContent$"/> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <search> <field name="name" string="Product" filter_domain="['|',('default_code','ilike',self),('name','ilike',self)]"/> <separator/> <filter string="Archive" domain="[('active', '=', False)]"/> <group> <filter string="State" context="{'group_by': 'state'}"/> </group> </search> </field> </record>

template.name: sewi_odoo_security
template.value:
<record id="module_category_$moduleName$" model="ir.module.category"> <field name="name">$moduleName2$</field> <field name="sequence" eval="99"/> </record>
<record id="group_$moduleName1$_user" model="res.groups"> <field name="name">User</field> <field name="category_id" ref="module_category_$moduleName1$"/> <field name="implied_ids" eval="[(4, ref('base.group_user'))]"/> </record>
<record id="group_$moduleName1$_manager" model="res.groups"> <field name="name">Manager</field> <field name="implied_ids" eval="[(4, ref('group_$moduleName1$_user'))]"/> <field name="category_id" ref="module_category_$moduleName1$"/> <field name="users" eval="[(4, ref('base.user_root'))]"/> </record>

template.name: sewi_odoo_toDo_xml_assets_backend
template.value: <template id="assets_backend" name="$moduleName$_assets" inherit_id="web.assets_backend"> <xpath expr="." position="inside"> <link rel="stylesheet" href="/$moduleName1$/static/src/less/$moduleName1$.less"/> <script type="text/javascript" src="/$moduleName1$/static/src/js/$moduleName1$.js"/> </xpath> </template>

template.name: sewi_odoo_tree_inherit
template.value:
<record id="$extraContent1$" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">$extraContent2$</field> <field name="model">$modelName$</field> <field name="inherit_id" ref="$jump$.$extraContent$"/> <field name="arch" type="xml">
<xpath expr="//field[@name='name']" position=""> <!-- Add new fields here --> </xpath>
</field> </record>

template.name: sewi_odoo_xml_xpath_help
template.value: <xpath expr="//field[@name='$fieldName$']" position="$position$"> <!-- /: Direct child--> <!-- //: Child any depth--> <!-- /..: Parent --> <!-- hasclass("classname"): Find by class--> <!-- div[1]: Find first div--> $end$ </xpath>

template.name: sewi_odoo_py_field_many2many
template.value: $fieldName$ = fields.Many2many( comodel_name="$comodelName$", string="$string$", column1="$column1$", column2="$column2$", relation="$relation$", ) $END$

template.name: sewi_odoo_py_compute
sewi_odoo_py_create
sewi_odoo_py_module
template.value:
# Copyright $YEAR$ sewisoft GmbH (https://sewisoft.de) # See module's manifest file for License.
from odoo import api, fields, models, _
class $ClassName$(models.Model):
# Private Attributes _name = "$ModelName$" _description = "$description$"
# Default methods
# Fields declaration $fieldName$ = fields.Char(string="$string$")
# Compute, inverse, search
# Constraints and onChanges
# CRUD methods (and name_get, name_search, ...) overrides
# Action methods
# Business methods
$END$

template.name: sewi_odoo_py_module_inherit
template.value:
from odoo import api, fields, models, _
class $ClassName$(models.Model):
# Private Attributes _inherit = "$ModelName$"
# Default methods
# Fields declaration $fieldName$ = fields.Char(string="$string$")
# Compute, inverse, search
# Constraints and onChanges
# CRUD methods (and name_get, name_search, ...) overrides
# Action methods
# Business methods
$END$

template.name: sewi_odoo_py_test
sewi_odoo_py_write
sewi_odoo_xml_action_window
template.value: $actionName$ ir.actions.act_window $modelName$ tree,kanban,form main

template.name: sewi_odoo_xml_action_server
template.value: <record id="$moduleName$_action_server_$actionNameSnake$" model="ir.actions.server"> <field name="name">$actionName$</field> <field name="type">ir.actions.server</field> <field name="model_id" ref="$modelId$"/> <field name="binding_model_id" ref="$bindingModelId$"/> <field name="state">code</field> <field name="code">$code$</field> </record>

template.name: sewi_odoo_xml_tree_inherit
template.value: <record id="$moduleNameSnake$_$modelNameSnake$_tree_view_inherit" model="ir.ui.view"> <field name="name">$viewName$.view.tree.inherit</field> <field name="model">$modelName$</field> <field name="inherit_id" ref="$inheritId$" /> <field name="arch" type="xml"> <xpath expr="//field[@name='$fieldName$']" position="$fieldPosition$"> $END$ </xpath> </field> </record>

template.name: sewi_odoo_xml_action_override
template.value: $modelName$ $viewMode$ $END$

template.name: sewi_odoo_py_action_window_ref
template.value: ids = [] action = self.env.ref("$actionXmlId$").read()[0] # action["name"] = _("Contacts") # action["res_id"] = self.id # action["domain"] = [('id', 'in', ids)] # action["context"] = {}
